movies.title: Starship Troopers: Invasion
movies.plot: On an asteroid, the Terran Federation's Fort Casey is on top of a bug hive. The Starship Alesia begins to deploy its troops to seize and control the hanger and rescue any survivors. 'Alpha' team landed without much resistance from the bugs, after they rendezvous with what's left of Fort Casey's troopers, LTA Daugherty then decided to hold till the John A. Warden evacuates while the Alesia stands by for immediate evacuation.
movies.simplePlot: On an asteroid, the Terran Federation's Fort Casey is on top of a bug hive. The Starship Alesia begins to deploy its troops to seize and control the hanger and rescue any survivors. 'Alpha'...

biography.bio: Luci Christian was born on March 18, 1973 in Houston, Texas, USA as Louisa Michelle Christian. She is an actress and writer, known for One Piece (1999), Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012) and Grave of the Fireflies (1988). She has been married to Michael Bell since 2008. They have two children.
biography.name: Luci Christian

biography.bio: David Matranga was born on April 20, 1975 in Houston, Texas, USA as David Anthony Matranga. He is known for his work on Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012), Journey to Agartha (2011) and Grave of the Fireflies (1988).
biography.name: David Matranga

biography.bio: Justin Doran was born on April 18, 1978. He is known for his work on The Revenant (2015), 2012 (2009) and This Means War (2012).
biography.name: Justin Doran

biography.bio: David Wald was born on May 11, 1973 as David R. Wald. He is an actor, known for Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012), Grave of the Fireflies (1988) and Golgo 13 (2008).
biography.name: David Wald

biography.bio: Andrew Love is known for his work on Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012), Journey to Agartha (2011) and Gilgamesh (2003). He is married to Emily Neves.
biography.name: Andrew Love

biography.bio: Leraldo Anzaldua is known for his work on Journey to Agartha (2011), Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012) and Gatchaman (1972).
biography.name: Leraldo Anzaldua

biography.bio: Sam Roman was born in 1975 in Miami, Florida, USA as Samuel Loman. He is an actor, known for Journey to Agartha (2011), Grave of the Fireflies (1988) and Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012).
biography.name: Sam Roman

biography.bio: Emily Neves was born on July 29, 1982 in Conroe, Texas, USA as Emily Marie Neves. She is an actress, known for Journey to Agartha (2011), Grave of the Fireflies (1988) and Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012). She was previously married to Andrew Love.
biography.name: Emily Neves

biography.bio: Melissa Davis is an actress, known for Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012), Appleseed Ex Machina (2007) and Redo gâden (2006).
biography.name: Melissa Davis

biography.bio: Kalob Martinez is an actor and director, known for Journey to Agartha (2011), Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012) and Appleseed (2004).
biography.name: Kalob Martinez

biography.bio: Born in Houston, Texas. Started in acting/ singing in Opera and Musical Theatre at the age of ten. Began his Voice Over career in 1999 with ADV Films. He has voiced over 200 Anime titles for ADV Films, Sentai Filmworks, FUNimation Entertainment, Okratraon 5000, and Du Art, including such iconic shows as Dragonball Z, Pokemon, Fullmetal Alchemist, and Soul Eater. Chris has also narrated over eighty Audiobooks, fronted a synthpop band called Paul Lynde is Dead, written a YA book about emo vampires called Scene Immortal, and currently resides in Annapolis, Maryland with his partner, Richard Davis.
biography.name: Chris Patton

biography.bio: Adam Gibbs is an actor, known for Grave of the Fireflies (1988), Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012) and Harlock: Space Pirate (2013).
biography.name: Adam Gibbs

biography.bio: Jovan Jackson was born as Eric Jackson. He is an actor, known for Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012), Closet Space (2008) and Halo Legends (2010).
biography.name: Jovan Jackson

biography.bio: Corey Hartzog is an actor, known for Journey to Agartha (2011), Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012) and Angel Beats! (2010).
biography.name: Corey Hartzog

biography.bio: Josh Grelle was born on November 2, 1985 in Clifton, Texas, USA. He is an actor and writer, known for Mass Effect: Paragon Lost (2012), Gatchaman (1972) and Starship Troopers: Invasion (2012).
biography.name: Josh Grelle

titlesAwards.titleAwardOutcome: Nominated BTVA Anime Dub Movies/Special Voice Acting Award

categories.category: Best Female Vocal Performance in an Anime Feature Film/Special in a Supporting Role
